info.name: Spinal cord, lateral motor cell column
info.description: The lateral motor cell column of the spinal cord is part of the gray matter of the ventral or anterior horn of the spinal cord at cervical and lumbar levels.  It is located laterally in the ventral horn and contains those lower motor neurons that innervate the extremities.
info.item: /Sections/Thin, Spinal Cord to Cerebrum/1 Sacral cord, middle
/Sections/Thin, Spinal Cord to Cerebrum/2 Lumbar cord, middle
/Sections/Thin, Spinal Cord to Cerebrum/3 Lumbar cord, upper
